summary: Most requested radio-group changes appear implemented: per-control orientation is added to types/defaults and saved layout, radio selection emits events with option label + binary code, and UI changes are described for full-area clickable options. However, there are a couple of changes not requested (notably a new backend query).

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request any new backend API for querying radio layout/orientation; orientation is expected to persist via the existing layout save/load.

hallucinated_features.description: Create Control button now includes additional gating/tooltips and auto-close behavior based on initialization/runtime mode.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope was limited to radio group UI/orientation/event logging; this is a broader UX change unrelated to radio groups.
